means: 万象（老挝首都）（或译永珍在湄公河中游北岸，隔河为泰国）

sentence.Network_en: Vientiane, the capital of Laos, nestles on the banks of the Mekong River.
sentence.Network_cn: 老挝的首都万象就座落在湄公河岸上.

sentence.Network_en: The Communist advance reached the Long Thieng area, the last stronghold before the capital of Vientiane.
sentence.Network_cn: 共产党部队已挺进到通往越南首都万象的最后一个要塞龙镇地区.

sentence.Network_en: Welcome to Vientiane, the capital of Laos, for agricultural investment.
sentence.Network_cn: 欢迎来老挝首都万象投资农业.

PerfectNetExp.abs: viens 维安, vientiane 万象国, viens 肌理

vte - vientiane wattay international airport ., 万象瓦岱国际机场.
in the capital , vientiane , an intellectual who is no fan of china says : " when the chinese piss in the mekong , we' re the ones that drown ...... "在老挝首都万象有一位对中国没有好感的知识分子说，“当中国人在湄公河撒尿时，被淹死的是我们。”
